author: GuguM
text:
Bridgerton S2 was asking the question: Can passion and practicality exist in the same plane? 
And the answer was a hard NO! 🙃

I wanted to swoon but alas!

author: GuguM
text: And I am very certain they are going to replace Rege Jean's Duke Hastings because honestly there's no other choice. They just wanted us to see it first so we don't throw a fit over it. Very smart.

author: GuguM
text: I am looking forward to the stories of all the rest now more than I was after S01 so there's that.

author: GuguM
text: Overall Bridgerton S02 wasn't that bad. It just fell on the unfortunate fate that befalls all sequels - never as exciting and fresh like the first but you have to be solid enough to build for the next upcoming season which I think S02 did very well 🤔

author: GuguM
text: My favourite episode was E06 because it truly was the only epi with actual feeling for me. Edwina finally finding out the truth and seeing with her own eyes what's been happening! Oh the devastation! And her courage to not stand around (quite literally 😅) for bullcrap was 🥺

author: GuguM
text: Miss Kate Sharma was overbearing shame over Edwina. I did not like that 😤. But her head was in the right place so I couldn't totally dislike her.

author: GuguM
text:
Shondaland and Netflix should have tried harder at keeping Rege Jean or at least actually replace him (am shuddering at the thought 😖) because story wise it didn't make sense the Duke did not attend his best friend's wedding and Royal wedding!!! 
And Anthony needed a best friend
